frontmatter.description: Notifies the user program when an item is added to one of the SOLIDWORKS tree structures (for example, FeatureManager design tree, ConfigurationManager tree, and so on).

title: DDrawingDocEvents_AddItemNotifyEventHandler
description: Notifies the user program when an item is added to one of the SOLIDWORKS tree structures (for example, FeatureManager design tree, ConfigurationManager tree, and so on).
